amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 109 of the bill which prohibits the use of funds to be used by the Army Corps of Engineers to adopt or enforce a change or supplement to the rule or guidance documents pertaining to the definition of waters under the jurisdiction of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 109 of the bill, which prohibits the use of funds to be used by the Army Corps of Engineers to adopt or enforce a change or supplement to the rule or guidance documents pertaining to the definition of waters under the jurisdiction of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 250 (Roll no. 540).
